meanings.definition: Expressing an opinion or reaction in response to something.
meanings.sent1: She is a commenting person who always shares her thoughts on different topics.
meanings.sent2: The commenting student had a lot to say about the book they just read.
meanings.sent3: The commenting cat seemed to have an opinion on everything, even the weather.
meanings.sent4: Her commenting nature was like a colorful painting, adding life to every conversation.
meanings.sent5: The commenting boy stood out in class for his insightful remarks.

meanings.sent1: He enjoys commenting on the weather every morning.
meanings.sent2: She was commenting on the beautiful flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The parrot started commenting on the visitors, mimicking their words.
meanings.sent4: His words were like birds commenting in the early morning, filling the air with sound.
meanings.sent5: The river flowed peacefully, commenting softly on the rocks it passed by.

meanings.definition: Providing feedback or input on a topic.
meanings.sent1: Students are commenting on the new school policy.
meanings.sent2: The customers were commenting on the quality of the service they received.
meanings.sent3: The tree leaves were commenting on the wind, rustling in agreement.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were commenting on the beauty of the sunset, reflecting its colors.
meanings.sent5: The stars were commenting on the night sky, twinkling in response to each other.
